q1.question: What is the main goal of this AI ? What do you want to predict ?

q2.question: Why do you need this AI ?

q3.question: Who is participating during the AI creation ?

q4.question: Can you reach the same goal without AI ? If yes, why AI is better for this problem ?

q5.question: What decisions will be taken with the output of this AI ?

q6.question: Who will be affected by this AI ?

q7.question: How users will respond to this AI : Define some questions that users may asked at the end about the AI prediction.

q8.question: What is the type of AI ? (classification, regression , etc.)

q9.question: Do you need this AI to be train regularly ? How often ?

q10.question: Which evaluation function will you use ? If binary classifier weight on positive or negative ?

q11.question: Using this evaluation method, do you think with time, it will affect prediction and be biased ?

q12.question: Define success metrics : how will you say your AI is succeeding in what it was build for ?

q13.question: Define negative metrics : how will you say your AI is failing in what it was build for ?

q14.question: What are the data that youâ€™ll need to build this AI ?

q15.question: Do you know if your data is reliable ? If no how will you say it can be reliable ?
